column4: hey, Edgy is behind in a package I need, but Etch has it.... is it safe to add etch repository listings in my sources.list ?
are you sure thats the app not the lib?
no, I wanted to get it via apt
you can try to get it from etch but no promise it will work.
its a lib and may depen on others that ubuntu might not have
is is ok to add etch lines to my sources.list ?
or should I download the debs individually
